ruleName: Total spent CAP_MULTIPLIER * the cap per game
ruleDescription: Blocks games for resolve in case total spent on game is greater CAP_MULTIPLIER x the cap per game
Blocks a game if there is a live bet that is greater than MAX_BUY_IN_THRESHOLD_USD

ruleName: Ticket buyIn or payout > BUY_IN_THRESHOLD_IN_USD or PAYOUT_THRESHOLD_IN_USD
ruleDescription: Block games if there are tickets which total buyIn or payout exceeds thresholds (BUY_IN_THRESHOLD_IN_USD or PAYOUT_THRESHOLD_IN_USD)
